I dont think the firewall is the problem on the forum some guy wrote this:
You dont need an internet connection for emulator to work. The problem is probably because u haven't updated the hosts file. When you modify the hosts file it makes the ubisoft url redirect to the emulator so ur doing something wrong.

_________________
In order to help and support the emulator you need:

1. Original Assassin's creed 2 Retail Dvd
2. Download the emu made by dormine
3. edit your windows/system32/drivers/etc/hosts file and add these values

127.0.0.1 static3.cdn.ubi.com
127.0.0.1 ubisoft-orbit.s3.amazonaws.com
127.0.0.1 onlineconfigservice.ubi.com
#127.0.0.1 orbitservice.ubi.com

Also to those trying to change their host files. Make sure it's not Read-Only under Properties.
